revised_title: Systematic Reduction Methods for Schrödinger Integrals in Antisymmetric Vector-Coupled Functions
tldr: The authors present a systematic development of properties and applications of eigenfunctions of angular operators, focusing on density kernel operators. They also provide a method for expanding complicated vector-coupled integrals in terms of coefficients. These methods are applicable to all Schrödinger integrals of vector-coupled functions, contributing to quantum calculations on atoms.
